welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Salem Lakes, where the charm of small town hospitality meets the beauty of nature. Known for our picturesque lakes and historic landmarks, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is used for domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is used for domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E is used for domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
